name: webstorm
description: * Howto deploy node-neo4j-peopleroad project 1. svn checkout https://walrus.svn.beanstalkapp.com/node-neo4j-peopleroad/ 2. cd node-neo4j-peopleroad/ 3. installing hapi 	$npm init 	$npm install --save hapi 4. installing official bolt driver 	$npm install neo4j-driver@1.0.0
